statements: SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_id FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id FROM recommendations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_id, timestamp FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, recommendation_id FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 3 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01'
SELECT user_id, recommendation_id, timestamp FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id IN (101, 102, 103)
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS recommendation_count FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(recommendation_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, gender FROM users WHERE age < 25;
SELECT u.name, i.interaction_type FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users INNER JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interactions.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE content_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND interaction_type = 'Like' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users GROUP BY gender HAVING total_users > 10 ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorRecommendationSystem WHERE user_id = 12345
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM UserBehaviorRecommendationSystem ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_rating FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_rating > 3 ORDER BY preference_rating DESC
SELECT user_id, recommendation_score FROM RecommendedItems WHERE recommendation_type = 'Top Pick'
SELECT item_id, recommendation_type FROM RecommendedItems ORDER BY item_id ASC
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehaviorRecommendationSystem ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC, user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, MAX(preference_rating) AS highest_rating FROM UserPreferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT item_id, recommendation_type, recommendation_score FROM RecommendedItems WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_rating FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY user_id, preference_rating DESC
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM UserBehaviorRecommendationSystem WHERE behavior_type LIKE '%click%' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, action_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, score FROM recommendations WHERE score > 4 ORDER BY score DESC, recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE action_type = 'view' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, r.score FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN products p ON ua.product_id = p.product_id JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.score > 4.0 AND r.recommendation_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT DISTINCT u.username, p.product_name, r.recommendation_date FROM users u JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE u.age < 25 ORDER BY u.username ASC, r.recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, name, price FROM items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, recommended_item_id, score FROM recommendations ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(price) FROM items GROUP BY category HAVING SUM(price) > 1000;
SELECT users.name, items.name FROM users JOIN items ON users.user_id = items.item_id WHERE items.price > 50 ORDER BY items.price DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 5;
